Identify.oai:repositoryName: Chicago Federation of Settlements and Neighborhood Centers Collection

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chicago Federation of Settlements and Neighborhood Centers Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chicago Federation of Settlements and Neighborhood Centers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Addams, Jane, 1860-1935 -- Sources
Bowen, Louise de Koven, b. 1859 -- Sources
Chicago Federation of Settlements and Neighborhood Centers -- Archives
Social settlements -- Illinois -- Chicago -- Sources
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The collection contains minutes, speeches, annual reports, studies, reports, and correspondence dating from 1900 to the present. The materials pertain to Chicago area settlement houses, social work, childcare, public housing, poverty, Jane Addams, and Louise de Koven Bowen.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: University of Illinois at Chicago, Main Library, Special Collections
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: All queries should be directed to University of Illinois at Chicago, Richard J. Daley Library, M/C 234, Special Collections, Box 8198, Chicago, IL 60680-8198. Or phone 312-996-2742. Or email lib-spec@listserv.uic.edu.
